definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: pasturing, shepherding, pasturage (alw. fig.);—sf. [[מַרְעִיתִי]] Je 23:1 Ez Eze 34:31, [[מַרְעִיתֶָךָ]] Ps 74:1, Ps 79:13, etc.;—
pasturing, shepherding, [[חאׁן מַרְעִיתִי]], of Isr. as flock of ´[[י]]:, Je 23:1 Ez Eze 34:31, cf. Ps 74:1, Ps 79:13, Ps 100:3 + Ps 95:7(rd. [[וְעַם יׇדוֹ]] ´[[מ]] :´[[ח]]:, cf. Hup-Now Che).
